meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spry or nimble.
meanings.sent1: Her sprynesses allowed her to easily dodge the obstacles in the obstacle course.
meanings.sent2: The cat's sprynesses were on full display as it leaped effortlessly from one rooftop to another.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's sprynesses were so impressive that even the other animals stopped to watch in amazement.
meanings.sent4: His sprynesses on the dance floor were like a graceful ballet dancer, captivating everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's sprynesses were so remarkable that they seemed almost supernatural.

meanings.definition: The ability to move quickly and easily; agility.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah's sprynesses allowed it to outrun any other animal in the savannah.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's sprynesses were evident in her flawless performance on the balance beam.
meanings.sent3: The ninja's sprynesses were so impressive that even the enemy couldn't help but admire them.
meanings.sent4: Her sprynesses in problem-solving made her the go-to person for any challenging task.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's sprynesses in combat were unmatched, making them a formidable opponent.
